@Testcase 3

dmem

0x00000000 2

0x00000004 8

0x00000008 13

0x0000000C 15

0x00000010 9

0x00000014 7

0x00000018 3

0x0000001C 5

0x00000020 -4

0x00000024 -6

imem

0x0000000 lw $a1 0x0004 $zero (地址32的值(-4)存到$a1) ($a1 = 8)

0x00000004 lw $a2 0x000C $a1 (地址8的值(13)存到$a2) ($a2 = 7)

0x00000008 subu $a3 $a1 $a2 ($a3 = 1)

0x0000000C halt


1 lw $a1 0x0004 $zero = 0x8C050020 = 10001100000001010000000000000100

2 lw $a2 0x000C $a1 = 0x8CA6000C = 10001100101001100000000000001100

3 subu $a3 $a1 $a2 = 0x00A63823 = 00000000101001100011100000100011

4 halt = 0xFFFFFFFF = 11111111111111111111111111111111
